name: Nectar (SinomodStudios)
description:
When the kingdom of the Bees becomes consumed with greed, they declare war in their search for the all-powerful Nectar. Led by their Queen, Beeatrix, the bee army has forged alliances across the globe to expand their reign of terror. It is up to the elemental guardians, five hummingbird sisters, to fend off this attack and restore balance to the land.

An explosive Shoot ‘Em Up like no other, Nectar focuses on five hummingbird sisters, each with their own playstyle. Defeat powerful bosses, unlock new cosmetics and save the world in this globe-trotting adventure!

 

Features:
  • A compelling story told through the eyes of the hummingbirds
  • Sub-bosses and bosses to every level!
  • Boss Rush to revisit your favorite battles!
  • Infinite Survival modes to combat waves of enemies
  • Customize your bird with unlockable cosmetics!
Meet the Birds:
  • Lizz – One with nature, her method of attack is rapid-fire.
  • Amber – A fire-based elemental, this hot-head uses incredibly fast bursts but has a cooldown.
  • Ginger – As fast as lightning, she uses homing electric attacks.
